# UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode

**Enumeration**

Constants that indicate how to size the title of this item.

## Declaration

```swift
enum LargeTitleDisplayMode
```

## Constants

- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.automatic**: Inherit the display mode from the previous navigation item.
- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.always**: Always display a large title.
- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.never**: Never display a large title.

## Enumeration Cases

- **UINavigationItem.LargeTitleDisplayMode.inline**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring the title

- **title**: The navigation item’s title that displays in the navigation bar.
- **attributedTitle**
- **largeTitle**: String to be used as the large title.
- **largeTitleDisplayMode**: The mode for displaying the title of the navigation bar.
